last_episode_to_air.name: Sunny & The Firework Festival
last_episode_to_air.overview:
In the series finale, the Friendly Falls Fireworks Festival has everyone buzzing. But when Sunny accidentally puts the event in jeopardy, she's got to work with her friends to make things right in time for the big fireworks show.

In the end, the Fireworks Festival gets back to normal, and everybody gets to watch the fireworks flying high in the sky.

name: Sunny Day
overview: 10-year-old Sunny, Friendly Falls's best hairstylist, learns that problems can be solved by using determination and creativity.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Silvergate renewed Sunny Day for a second season. According to The Hollywood Reporter, the second season will feature a new vehicle, Groom and Vroom, which was designed only on pets, in addition to the Glam Van. In addition, Lacey and KC will also join Sunny, Doodle, Rox, and Blair to help out for the joint.

episodes.name: Stick With Me
episodes.overview: Rox and Blair get stuck together with sticky hairspray. Timmy and Cindy help Sunny find the ingredients for an "unsticking" solution while Rox and Blair learn about teamwork.

episodes.name: "Friendship Day"
episodes.overview: Doodle thinks that Sunny has forgotten about him on Friendship Day, so he runs away from the salon only to be caught by Scratch.

episodes.name: Puppy Love
episodes.overview: Doodle finds a lost puppy and enlists the help of the girls in order to prevent her from being caught by the neighborhood dogcatcher, Scratch.

episodes.name: Style Swap
episodes.overview: Blair and her pop star idol Mandy swap places for the day after discovering that they look almost identical.

episodes.name: Sunny & The Princesses
episodes.overview: When Timmy gets a job as the chauffeur for two visiting princesses, Dominica and her younger sister Annabella, Sunny and the girls bring Anabella on a tour of the town.

episodes.name: Junior's Teddy Bear
episodes.overview: Sunny helps Rox's younger brother search for his teddy bear after it goes missing, unaware it was at the salon the entire time.

episodes.name: Sunny Birthday Wish List
episodes.overview: Doodle, Rox, and Blair try to help Sunny with her birthday wish list while Cindy prepares a cake for her.

episodes.name: Top Dog
episodes.overview: When Doodle enters Timmy's pet show contest, he must decide if it is more important to win or to help a friend in need.

episodes.name: Messenger Mix-Up
episodes.overview: Timmy has volunteered to deliver the mail around town, but a mix-up causes all of the packages to go to the wrong people.

episodes.name: Pumpkin Pursuit
episodes.overview: Blair hopes to enter Timmy’s costume contest, but trouble arises when Lacey steals her pumpkin costume.

episodes.name: The Royal Visit
episodes.overview: Sunny and friends help teach the egotistical Prince Dudley how to be kind to others after Timmy is appointed to bring the prince to a royal ball.

episodes.name: The Topi-Hairy Contest
episodes.overview: Timmy is hosting a topiary sculpting contest and Sunny is excited to enter. However, when her entry is sabotaged by Lacey, Sunny uses her hair-styling skills to create a new topiary out of hair.

episodes.name: If Timmy Gives You Apples
episodes.overview: Timmy's enthusiasm for delivering apples start to get the best of him when the salon overflows in fruit.

episodes.name: Lacey's Salon
episodes.overview: Lacey opens up her own salon to rival Sunny's, but results become disastrous when famous opera singer Dame Tralada comes in.

episodes.name: Wild Styled
episodes.overview: After Blair gets lost on a camping trip, Sunny and Rox use their styling tools—and skills—to find her.

episodes.name: Best Christmas Ever
episodes.overview: Doodle is trapped in a snowstorm when meeting his younger sister on Christmas Eve.

episodes.name: Sunny Not So Simple Concert
episodes.overview: Sunny and the girls organize a concert for Jonny-Ray to showcase his simple things, but Sunny doesn’t follow the rules.

episodes.name: Clowning Around
episodes.overview: When Rox’s cousin Lulu runs off after ruining Junior’s birthday party, the girls have to find her and discover she has a special skill to save the party.

episodes.name: Poodle Puff Pals
episodes.overview: Lacey and KC have a falling out because Lacey doesn’t listen to her, and Sunny has to help the two reconcile.

episodes.name: Cirque Du Sunny
episodes.overview: When the circus gets postponed, Sunny and her friends start their own circus which proves to be harder than they thought.

episodes.name: The Royal Portrait
episodes.overview: Rox is asked to make Prince Dudley’s royal portrait, only for him to appoint himself.

episodes.name: A Day At The Beach
episodes.overview: A musical duo called the Surf Bros get lost on their way to a beach concert, and Sunny and Doodle must help them get to the stage on time.

episodes.name: Sleepover Surprise
episodes.overview: The girls have a slumber party at the salon, but when the fun is interrupted by a mysterious visitor, they work together to catch the culprit.

episodes.name: The Forever Home
episodes.overview: Blair bonds with a dog at Scratch’s adoption center and comes to the rescue when she gets in trouble.

episodes.name: Lulu The Woodland Fairy
episodes.overview: Lulu tries to become a Woodland Fairy like Rox, but the girls’ help only gets in the way.

episodes.name: Sunny Squad
episodes.overview: Sunny and her friends compete in a soccer match against Lacey and KC and Rox and Junior discover where their true talents lie.

episodes.name: Band Together
episodes.overview: The girls form a rock band to perform in a talent show hosted by Timmy, but when Lacey threatens their fun, the girls use magic tricks to save the day.

episodes.name: A Different Duo
episodes.overview: Johnny-Ray wins a chance to perform with rap music star Fee-B, but their styles don't mesh and they part ways; it takes Johnny-Ray helping Fee-B, Sunny and the girls out of a jam to realize what the pair can achieve.

episodes.name: Jump
episodes.overview: Doodle puts on jumping shoes meant for Felix the Fearless; when he does, he's having too much fun jumping, and trying to stop is impossible to do.

episodes.name: Pet Parlor
episodes.overview: When the salon is overrun with pet clients, Doodle dreams up a Pet Parlor that the girls build with Timmy's help; before the salon can open, they will need to find and save Dame Tralada's dog.

episodes.name: Parlor Problems
episodes.overview: Lacey and KC step in to manage the increasingly busy Pet Parlor, but lose track of Hannah's dog, Tutu; Sunny and company must try to undo a series of mix-ups before Tutu's big show.

episodes.name: A Berry Good Smell
episodes.overview: Sunny and Doodle search for a special berry that is used in an ingredient in Dame Tralada's shampoo; a bird who also is fond of the berries scoops up Her Majesty.

episodes.name: 3 Headed Rose
episodes.overview: When Peter's prized flower wilts under Sunny, Rox, Blair and Doodle's watch, they head to the woods to find another.

episodes.name: The Royal Wedding
episodes.overview: Dominica and Annabella's prince Corgi, George, bonds with a spunky, scruffy stray named Ginger; the dogs are set for a royal wedding, but Scratch interferes.

episodes.name: Sunny & The Springtacular
episodes.overview: An excited Doodle offers to watch the famous baby chicks before the big Springtacular show; when Doodle loses track of them, he needs Sunny's help to find the chicks in time for their performance with Dame Tralada.

episodes.name: Doodle The Boss
episodes.overview: Seeing everyone performing unique jobs at the salon inspires Doodle to start a smoothie stand; when Doodle realizes business ownership isn't for him and gets in over his head, Sunny helps bail him out.

episodes.name: Monkey Business
episodes.overview: Peter enlists Sunny and Doodle to help track down a playful monkey that was mistakenly delivered to his shop and is now loose in the town.

episodes.name: Get Her To The Vet
episodes.overview: Rosie is nervous about her first trip to the vet, Dr. Vanessa; after a series of misunderstandings and a high-speed chase result in Rosie being stuck, Sunny, Blair and Martina must save Rosie and get her to the vet.

episodes.name: Sunny & The Firework Festival
episodes.overview:
In the series finale, the Friendly Falls Fireworks Festival has everyone buzzing. But when Sunny accidentally puts the event in jeopardy, she's got to work with her friends to make things right in time for the big fireworks show.

In the end, the Fireworks Festival gets back to normal, and everybody gets to watch the fireworks flying high in the sky.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Silvergate renewed Sunny Day for a second season. According to The Hollywood Reporter, the second season will feature a new vehicle, Groom and Vroom, which was designed only on pets, in addition to the Glam Van. In addition, Lacey and KC will also join Sunny, Doodle, Rox, and Blair to help out for the joint.
